How do i install when it does not have install directory???
@Atkecar: That makes absolutely no sense. You install the patch, then copy the crack to bin_ship directory in Dragon Age 2 directory.

I need help, the download doesn't contain the crack, only files named flt-dao2u102.001 - flt-dao2u102.006 and flt-dao2u102.sfv (if that's the crack, I don't know how to get it working) and of course the nfo file (which didn't really help me at all). So, what do I need to do to get this working?
Same as the guy above any help would be lovely : )
Your antivir block this files. Now you know what to do :)

So I install the patch, all is well.
But them I try to unrar the crack and I get an error (diagnostic message, something with 'unknown method'...).

Maybe something went wrong during the download????

I can't see the file to start the compilement process....what do i do with all these .sfv parts....so anyway I deleted this cracked update, went and downloaded the 1.02 update, but before I updated it I moved my dragonage2.exe file to a safe place, installed, then copied over the new .exe - I know I have probably missed out on half of the new fixes, but I tried doing the 1.02 update once already and it reset my registration to the servers

So I installed this and everything went fine, but when I started playing, after killing about 5 of those scout monsters or whatever they're called, the game crashes. Did I miss a step in the installation or something?
